IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'cdb-synapse-link2'))
    THROW 50000, 'As a prerequisite, create a credential with Azure Cosmos DB key in SECRET option:
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [cdb-synapse-link2]
    WITH IDENTITY = ''SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE'', SECRET = ''<Enter your Azure Cosmos DB key here>''', 0
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(​PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cdb-synapse-link2;Database=RetailSalesDemoDB',
                OBJECT = 'StoreDemoGraphics',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cdb-synapse-link2'
) AS [StoreDemoGraphics]


CREATE database RetailCosmosDB

CREATE VIEW StoreDemoGraphics
as
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(​PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cdb-synapse-link2;Database=RetailSalesDemoDB',
                OBJECT = 'StoreDemoGraphics',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cdb-synapse-link2'
) AS [StoreDemoGraphics]


CREATE VIEW RetailSales
as
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(​PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cdb-synapse-link2;Database=RetailSalesDemoDB',
                OBJECT = 'RetailSales',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cdb-synapse-link2'
) AS q1



CREATE VIEW Products
as
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(​PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cdb-synapse-link2;Database=RetailSalesDemoDB',
                OBJECT = 'Products',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cdb-synapse-link2'
) AS [Products]


Select
sum(p.[quantity]) as [sum quantity]
,p.[advertising]
,p.[storeId]
,p.[weekStarting]
,q.[largeHH]
FROM [dbo].[RetailSales] as p
INNER JOIN [dbo].[StoreDemoGraphics] as q ON q.[storeId] = p.[storeId]
GROUP BY p.[advertising], p.[storeId], p.[weekStarting], q.[largeHH]
